(1)  East River Drive, north from foot of East 108th Street, and the Har lem River, and showing this arterial highway in the process of evolution. This street was formerly known as Pleasant Ave.
August 18, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, from the rivers edge and slightly northward.
August 18, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
(3)
A view at East 109th Street, and showing construction materials in
the foreground4 on the west gide gf the street.
March s, 193b.
P. L. Sperr.
